transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji sir bataiye.
Customer: Good morning sir, Ruchi baat kar rahe the IndiaMART se.
Executive: Achcha achcha IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hain.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Bataiye ji.
Customer: Sir aap bataiye service ke regarding.
Customer: Starting calls mein call kiya tha.
Executive: Haan service service to jo hai chal hi rahi hai. Jyadatar log inquiry dal de rahe hain. Aur jab call karo to kahte hain ki check kar rahe the.
Customer: Achcha to matlab jaise matlab agar kehe ke fir matlab positive nahi nikal raha hai.
Executive: Ab maan lijiye hame per day ek lead milti hai to vo aise hi isi mein chala jata hai.
Executive: Kauno jo hai kahte hain ki abhi check kar rahe the ki kitne ki machine milti hai.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Haan to jo hai ye haal hai jo hai to ab is tarah se jo hai jyadatar ek hafte se jo hai ho raha hai jo hai.
Customer: To jaise jaise hai na aap usko bhi make sure kariye ki details share kar dijiye, price share kar dijiye. Jo basic cheeze hai apni company ka vo unko share kar dijiye. Kyunki check kar rahe the to ho sakta hai agar unko price aapka kam lag gaya ya price unko achcha lag gaya aapki aapka product ka overall cheeze unko pasand aa gayi to fir vo deal karenge. Thoda sa time lete hai lekin clients jate nahi hai.
Executive: Haan bahut ab ab dekhiye ek MP ka hai vo jo hai baat kiya to keh rahe ki abhi abhi nahi lena hai. Jab lena hoga to bataunga.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Are vo time bataoge.
Customer: Haan ye baat sahi hai. Kab tak lena hai. Sahi hai. Unko matlab agar inhone bol diya ki lena hai to bataunga fir bhi unko beech beech mein kuch messages, kuch company ka kuch offer hai kuch bhi hai unko beech beech mein na WhatsApp pe aap share karte rahiye. Unko aise matlab chhod mat dijiye. Vo keh rahe hai ki lena hai to bataunga to ho sakta hai ki aaj nahi kal nahi parso vo lenge.
Executive: Nahi share karte hain par koi reply nahi dete.
Customer: Thik hai thoda sa matlab time lete hai log lekin hamara yahi hamara kaam yahi hai ki hame unko jane nahi dena hai. Hame unse beech beech mein apna jo bhi catalog share kar diya agar catalog kuch improve hua hai usko share ye sab hame share kar dena hai. Aur reviews ki thoda sa hame apne improve kar lene hai. Ek abhi aapki deal hui thi koi Anupama Bag se Uttar Pradesh Sheel Sheelampur kuch hai. To unse kya kuch matlab unhone rating achchi to kya unse matlab deal kuch deal karne ka nahi hua hai nahi hua hai.
Executive: Nahi hua hai nahi hua hai.
Customer: Achcha matlab inse deal bhi nahi hua matlab
Executive: Nahi hua hai.
Customer: Bina September mein vo bhi Uttar Pradesh se hi hai.
Executive: Haan Uttar Pradesh se hi hai lekin deal nahi hua hai. Abhi abhi main bata raha hu na ye pure October mein baat chit hui hai. Final daily deal nahi kiya koi.
Executive: Abhi October hai November aa gaya abhi tak jo hai dekhiye kono kono ka kab kal baat kiye to ek keh rahe ki
Executive: Barish ki vajah se hamara dhan kharab ho gaya. Isiliye hum aa nahi paye aapke pass. Ab ek hafta aur humko time dijiye to jo hai hum batate hain.
Customer: Haan nahi to vo agar unhone aise bola na to vo lenge bas vo aise hi bhale keh rahe ho lekin agar vo
Executive: Haan ab ek kafi ab October se wait karte karte jo hai November aa gaya. Ab November tak kal 5 tarikh tha.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Customer time lete hi hain.
Customer: Haan customer time lete hai. Ab hum log bhi hai koi cheez agar customer ban ke hum jate hai to jaruri nahi hota ki hum turant le le. Hamara bhi hota hai ki yaha dekh liya chalo vaha dekh lete hai ho sakta hai kuch aur badhiya mil jaye. To bas yahi hai. Haan bas vahi baat hai. Achcha hum puch rahe the ek koi milk processing plant and machine hai jo aapke catalog mein to add nahi hai lekin aap usme aap uski buyleads le rahe hai to agar aap is product ko add kar denge.
Executive: Add add kar dijiye na.
Customer: Haan haan. Add usko kar dijiye milk processing plant.
Executive: Haan haan. Ab hum hum aapko video link share karte hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: To aap usse video meet pe aa jaise bhi ye jo product aap bol rahe hai na milk processing wala to hum log isko apne catalog mein fir isko add kar dete hai. To hamara catalog isko bhi thoda sa improve ho jayega aur jo jo kuch kuch ke prices nahi add hai to vo bhi add ho jayenge. To hum aapko share kare link aapke mail pe?
Executive: Haan to karwao. Ye to ke bola jaa fir ke bola link karwao. Kya sun rahe idhar?
Customer: Dekhiye aapke mail pe kya hoga?
Executive: Achcha to kaise jaise maine jaise aapko bol diya to jo hai aap usko add kar dijiye jo hai ya humko photo to bhejna karna padega?
Customer: Nahi nahi aapko photo nahi bhejna padega lekin jaise aap jaise ab kya hai aapke product ke bare mein aap jyada jante hai na to jaise aap video meet pe rahenge to jo bhi hum
Executive: Dekhiye hamara jo hai dekhiye milk processing plant ho gaya. Milk ATM ho gaya. Haan. Haan milk ATM ho gaya, milk vending machine ho gaya. Khoa machine ho gaya. Ye sab dal dijiye aap.
Customer: Hmm. Achcha thik hai. Humne na aapko link bheja hai aap ek bar agar abhi aapke mail aapke isi WhatsApp number pe share kar de kya hum aapko ye jo ID hai video meet ka?
Executive: Haan kar dijiye jo hai.
Customer: Haan rukiye hum aapko share kar dete hai to jaise kya hoga na ki aap video meet pe rahenge na to us dauran jo bhi hum changes kar rahe honge to aap direct dekh lenge to vo thoda sahi rahega.
Executive: Achcha achcha thik hai to kaise video calling mein?
Customer: Haan rukiye ye aapka WhatsApp number hai?
Executive: Haan WhatsApp number hai.
Customer: Thik hai hum na aapko abhi link bhej rahe hai aapke WhatsApp pe thik hai fir aap us link ko daba ke aap usko video meet pe aa jayenge fir hum log matlab fir video meet pe hum log cheeze improve karte hai thik hai hum aapko bhej de rahe hai ek minute ruk jaye.
Executive: Thik hai ji thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai. Okay.
Customer: Se kaise normally baat kare.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting positive leads.

- Customer says most leads are just checking.

- Customer says deal not finalized in October.



Resolution:

- Executive will add milk processing plant to catalog.

- Executive will receive a video link on WhatsApp.

- Executive will join video meet to improve catalog.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, milk processing plant, video meet
